title: To Mr. Robert Whitehall at the wels at Astrop
author: Gayton, Edmund, 1608-1666.
notes: Attributed to Gayton by Wing. Author's initials signed at end,  followed by ms. note, "Edm. Geyton, esq. Bedle of Physicke, ae. 1666, in the    time of Long Vacation."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
